text: The arrondissement of Limoges is an arrondissement of France, in the Haute- Vienne department, Nouvelle-Aquitaine region. Its capital is the city of Limoges. ==History== When the Haute-Vienne department was created on 1800, the arrondissement of Limoges was part of that original department. ==Geography== The arrondissement of Limoges is the most southern arrondissement of the Haute-Vienne department. It is bordered to the north by the arrondissement of Bellac, to the east by the Creuse department, to the south by the Corrèze department, to the southwest by the Dordogne department and to the west by the arrondissement of Rochechouart. The arrondissement of Limoges is the largest arrondissement of the department, with area of , and it is the one with more people living in it with a population of 298,578 inhabitants and a population density of inhabitants/km². ==Composition== ===Cantons=== After the reorganisation of the cantons in France,Décret n° 2014-194 du 20 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de la Haute-Vienne cantons are not subdivisions of the arrondissements so they could have communes that belong to different arrondissements. In the arrondissement of Limoges, the canton of Ambazac is the only canton that has communes in more than one arrondissement as can be seen in the following table: Cantons and communes in the arrondissement of Limoges INSEE Code Canton Arrondissements Total Bellac Limoges Rochechouart 8701 Aixe-sur- Vienne 10 10 8702 Ambazac 5 11 16 8705 Condat-sur-Vienne 12 12 8706 Couzeix 7 7 8707 Eymoutiers 32 32 8708 Limoges-1 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8709 Limoges-2 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8710 Limoges-3 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8711 Limoges-4 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8712 Limoges-5 2 + part of Limoges 2 + part of Limoges 8713 Limoges-6 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8714 Limoges-7 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8715 Limoges-8 part of Limoges part of Limoges 8716 Limoges-9 1 + part of Limoges 1 + part of Limoges 8716 Panazol 2 2 8720 Saint-Léonard-de-Noblat 13 13 8721 Saint-Yrieix-la- Perche 17 17 ===Communes=== The arrondissement of Limoges has 108 communes; they are (with their INSEE codes)ː #
